data.description: makes context menu handlers for Explorer
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module basically lets you write extensions to the Windows
    Shell in Perl (rather than in C/C++, which is rather tedious). The
    first kind of extensions that is supported are context menu handlers
    (although i'm looking at how to support query info extensions and
    property sheet page handlers). For now the extensions themselves are
    implemented as packages that subclass Win32::ShellExt. I'd be
    willing to change the name, but i think this one makes it clear what
    the module does.
